source: ##### This purpose of this notebook is to extract logs from AppInsights and store incremental data into pipeline_logs_odw table
##### It does a API call to AppInsigts and get the relevant pipeline logs from master pipeline logs table

import requests
import json
import re
from datetime import datetime
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, substring
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType, TimestampType, IntegerType

##### Extract Appinsights logs into a dataframe incrementally
###### Keyvault lookup for app_id, client_id - no expiry set - if for any reason client_id changes, it needs to be update in the keyvault 
###### Access token generated for API call to AppInsights

# credentials
tenant_id = "5878df98-6f88-48ab-9322-998ce557088d"         
client_id = mssparkutils.credentials.getSecretWithLS("ls_kv", "application-insights-clientid")        
app_id = mssparkutils.credentials.getSecretWithLS("ls_kv", "application-insights-appid")   
client_secret= mssparkutils.credentials.getSecretWithLS("ls_kv", "application-insights-reader")


# Get the last Max data from the table and log incremental based on this watermark

try:
    last_checkpoint =  spark.sql('select MAX(timestamp) from logging.pipeline_logs_odw').collect()[0][0]
    if last_checkpoint is None:
        last_checkpoint = "1900-01-01T13:42:28.121734Z"
except:
    # For a full load
    last_checkpoint = "1900-01-01T13:42:28.121734Z"

print(f"Using last checkpoint timestamp: {last_checkpoint}")

# Get AAD token
token_url = f"https://login.microsoftonline.com/{tenant_id}/oauth2/v2.0/token"
token_data = {
    "grant_type": "client_credentials",
    "client_id": client_id,
    "client_secret": client_secret,
    "scope": "https://api.applicationinsights.io/.default"
}
token_resp = requests.post(token_url, data=token_data)
token_resp.raise_for_status()
access_token = token_resp.json()["access_token"]

# KQL query with incremental filter
query = f"""
customEvents
| where name == "ODW_Master_Pipeline_Logs"
| where timestamp > datetime({last_checkpoint})
| project
    timestamp, 
    Stage = tostring(customDimensions.Stage),
    PipelineName = tostring(customDimensions.PipelineName),
    PipelineRunID = tostring(customDimensions.PipelineRunID),
    StatusMessage = tostring(customDimensions.StatusMessage),
    StatusCode = tostring(customDimensions.StatusCode),
    ErrorMessage = tostring(customDimensions.ErrorMessage),
    StartTime = tostring(customDimensions.StartTime),
    EndTime = tostring(customDimensions.EndTime),
    PipelineTriggerType = tostring(customDimensions.PipelineTriggerType),
    PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineName = tostring(customDimensions.PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineName),
    PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineRunID = tostring(customDimensions.PipelineTriggeredbyPipelineRunID),
    PipelineExecutionTimeInSec = tostring(customDimensions.PipelineExecutionTimeInSec),
    ActivityType = tostring(customDimensions.ActivityType),
    Inserts = tostring(customDimensions.Inserts),
    Updates = tostring(customDimensions.Updates),
    Deletes = tostring(customDimensions.Deletes),
    PipelineTriggerID = tostring(customDimensions.PipelineTriggerID),
    PipelineTriggerName = tostring(customDimensions.PipelineTriggerName),
    DurationSeconds = tostring(customDimensions.DurationSeconds)
| order by timestamp asc
"""


url = f"https://api.applicationinsights.io/v1/apps/{app_id}/query"
headers = {"Authorization": f"Bearer {access_token}"}
params = {"query": query}

resp = requests.get(url, headers=headers, params=params)
resp.raise_for_status()
result = resp.json()


if result["tables"]:
    columns = [c["name"] for c in result["tables"][0]["columns"]]
    rows = result["tables"][0]["rows"]
    if len(rows) == 0:
        mssparkutils.notebook.exit("No new data available")
    else:
        df = spark.createDataFrame(rows, schema=columns)

else:
    print("No new data found.")
